text: مَّثَلُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ٱلَّتِى وُعِدَ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ ۖ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۖ أُكُلُهَا دَآئِمٌ وَظِلُّهَا ۚ تِلْكَ عُقْبَى ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوا۟ ۖ وَّعُقْبَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ ٱلنَّارُ

translation.en.sahih: The example of Paradise, which the righteous have been promised, is [that] beneath it rivers flow. Its fruit is lasting, and its shade. That is the consequence for the righteous, and the consequence for the disbelievers is the Fire.
translation.id.indonesian: Perumpamaan surga yang dijanjikan kepada orang-orang yang takwa ialah (seperti taman); mengalir sungai-sungai di dalamnya; buahnya tak henti-henti sedang naungannya (demikian pula). Itulah tempat kesudahan bagi orang-orang yang bertakwa, sedang tempat kesudahan bagi orang-orang kafir ialah neraka.
